org.springframework.cloud.service.relational

Interface PooledDataSourceCreator<SI extends RelationalServiceInfo>

  • Type Parameters:
    SI - the RelationalServiceInfo type for the underlying database service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDbcpPooledDataSourceCreator, DbcpLikePooledDataSourceCreator, HikariCpPooledDataSourceCreator, TomcatDbcpPooledDataSourceCreator, TomcatJdbcPooledDataSourceCreator

    public interface PooledDataSourceCreator<SI extends RelationalServiceInfo>
    DataSource creator that produces a pooled connection
    Author:
    Ramnivas Laddad
